definitions.definition: A political doctrine or philosophy that proposes that the rights and powers of ordinary people are exploited by a privileged elite , and supports their struggle to overcome this.
The practice of appealing to the interests of the common people.

main_definition: ( philosophy ) A political doctrine or philosophy that proposes that the rights and powers of ordinary people are exploited by a privileged elite , and supports their struggle to overcome this.
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory ) The practice of appealing to the interests of the common people.
